solution_line_template: There are {total_blocks_to_home}/{blocks_per_run_segment} = <<{total_blocks_to_home}/{blocks_per_run_segment}={num_segments}>>{num_segments} sets of two blocks that Justin can run.
Thus, he can run home for {num_segments} x {minutes_per_run_segment} = <<{num_segments}*{minutes_per_run_segment}={total_minutes_to_home}>>{total_minutes_to_home} minutes.
